name: ColorProperty
description: Represents a color property on the Monopoly board, which is the improvable type of property.

constants.name: NUM_HOUSES_BEFORE_HOTEL
constants.description: The number of houses a Player must build before upgrading to a hotel

instanceVariables.name: _house_price
instanceVariables.description: The amount a Player must pay to build a house or hotel on this ColorProperty

instanceVariables.name: _num_houses
instanceVariables.description: The number of houses currently on this ColorProperty. We adopt the convention that when this equals NUM_HOUSES_BEFORE_HOTEL + 1, there is a hotel on this ColorProperty

methods.name: __init__()
methods.description: Initializes a ColorProperty object with the given number of houses

methods.name: landed()
methods.description: Returns the GroupOfChanges resulting from the Player's landing on this ColorProperty

methods.name: get_rent_with()
methods.description: Returns the amount a Player must pay on this ColorProperty with the given number of houses on it

methods.name: build()
methods.description: Builds the given quantity of houses on this ColorProperty

methods.name: demolish()
methods.description: Demolishes the given quantity of houses on this ColorProperty

methods.name: has_hotel()
methods.description: Returns True if this ColorProperty has a hotel on it, False if not

methods.name: __str__()
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this ColorProperty
